summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the enactment of the Seattle Municipal Code; amending Seattle Municipal Code Sections 12A.04.020 through 12A.04.060, 12A.06.080, 12A.10.070, 12A.12.010, 12A.14.080, 12A.14.090 through 12A.14.120, 12A.16.010, 12A.16.040, 12A.28.050, 12A.28.070, 12A.52.020; adding Sections 12A.16.025, 12A.06.120, 12A.06.130, 12A.06.140, 12A.06.150, 12A.08.105, 12A.10.100, 12A.16.050 and 12A.16.060 to the Seattle Municipal Code; amending the Seattle Criminal Code (Ordinance 102843, as recently amended by Ordinances 108814, 108867, 108908, 108995, 109037, 109125, 109190 and 109433), Sections 12A.02.030, 12A.04.140, 12A.04.090, 12A.04.195, 12A.04.196, 12A.04.197, 12A.04.198, 12A.08.290, 12A.12.150, 12A.12.140, 12A.16.020, 12A.17.140, 12A.17.160, 12A.20.020, 12A.20.110, 12A.20.010, 12A.20.070, 12A.17.170, 12A.20.120, making said amendments effective on the effective date of the Seattle Municipal Code; and declaring the emergency therefor.
